title: Good-as-It-Gets for Caterpillar, Seeing Something in Small Caps, Upward Trend for Oil
itunes:title: Good-as-It-Gets for Caterpillar, Seeing Something in Small Caps, Upward Trend for Oil
description:
Bloomberg Daybreak Asia Reporter Ramy Inocencio joins Carol and they speak to Joe Deaux, Bloomberg News Metals & Mining Reporter, about a mixed day for Caterpillar following earnings. George Young, Portfolio Manager at Villere & Co., discusses small cap investing. Dan Heckman, National Investment Consultant at U.S. Bank shares his outlook for oil. Ben Elgin, Bloomberg News Project & Investigations Reporter, explains Facebook's fake news fight. And we Drive to the Close with Jim Lowell, Chief Investment Officer at Adviser Investments. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
